name: Indestructible
description:
#### "Indestructible"

is a single player campaign dedicated to a Starcraft 1 player, one of clan [MB] Commanders Argutaris[MB], my father.

Press for [Update Log](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/maps-argutaris/pages/update-log/>)

Learn more about the campaign [here](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/maps-argutaris/pages/about/>)

#### Requirements:

You shall require a machine that can run the game on ultra-extreme graphic settings while still runing another instance of the same game in the background on medium settings, and that is final. I dont give a damn flying crappy penny about your lag. The graphics requirements for this campaign is ultra-extreme. If you use lesser settings, you are loosing the experience, since some terrain elements might not look as they had been intended to look like. Plus the trigger work, being a one-mans-job throughout the years, is in most cases - sloppy, and will lag on lesser machines with not enough active memory. Thats just the way it is...

#### Difficulty:

Varies and is unchangeable. Mostly - Brutal.
author: argutaris
